__e: First, those into whose ears I blew my sin.... ...had lost their mind. They ran away screaming and they're still running.
I've lost my mind for you, and I'll do anything, but tell me the truth.
You flipped out and shot everybody, even your own men.
You gone crazy out of your mind.
Is this it? Have you finally gone 'round the friggin' pipe? !
What do you expect after the pushing around we gave him?
Until the dawn of the third day, the police got pissed off for real.
Except now, he got really crazy.
What do you expect after the pushing around we gave him?
